column4: When I click my mouse it is not always registering the click at the location of my cursor, sometimes it registers at some previously clicked location, this is highly unusable, please advise using 8.10.

When I click my mouse it is not always registering the click at the location of my cursor, sometimes it registers at some previously clicked location, this is highly unusable, please advise using 8.10.
you have the right driver for the mouse, is it a regular mouse?
touchpad, been working fine for nearly 2 years, this is a recent development
as in the last 6 hours or so
